```{r}
#| label: nav-table
#| echo: false

part1 <- fs::dir_ls("./2025/", recurse = TRUE) |>
  str_subset("_pt1") |>
  str_extract("(?<=script_day)(.*)(?=_pt)") |>
  as.numeric()

part2 <- fs::dir_ls("./2025/", recurse = TRUE) |>
  str_subset("_pt2") |>
  str_extract("(?<=script_day)(.*)(?=_pt)") |>
  as.numeric()

one_done <- setdiff(setdiff(seq(12), part2), setdiff(seq(12), part1))
none_done <- intersect(setdiff(seq(12), part2), setdiff(seq(12), part1))

htmltools::tags$style(
  str_c(collapse = "\n",
    c(
      glue::glue(
        "#panelset_001_day-[one_done] {color: #EBB626 !important;}",
        .open = "[", .close = "]"
      ),
      glue::glue(
        "#panelset_001_day-[none_done] {color: #D63131 !important;}",
        .open = "[", .close = "]"
      )
    )
  )
)
```
